titleInfo.title: Platform Sūtra of the Sixth Patriarch on the Dharma-treasure

mods.note: for text info see PLATFORM SUTRA(A); this edition is based on the Japanese edition Kooshooji bon Rokuso dankyoo 興聖寺本六祖壇經, ed. in SUZUKI/KUDA 1934. The Kooshooji version was found after the second world-war at the Kooshooji temple (a Rinzai 臨濟 temple on Horikawa Street in North Kyooto).
